subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Indiana Fever advanced to the W.N.B.A. finals for the first time, beating the defending champion Detroit Shock, 72-67, on Saturday in Indianapolis in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: The Indiana Fever advanced to the W.N.B.A. finals for the first time, beating the defending champion Detroit Shock, 72-67, on Saturday in Indianapolis in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals.
